table.title: Overall Metrics
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby searchtype, user | stats sum(count) as count sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as "Adhoc Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="dashboard",count,0))) as "Dashboard Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="realtime",count,0))) as "Realtime Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="scheduled",count,0))) as "Scheduled Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="summarization",count,0))) as "Summarization Search Count" by user | stats sum(count) as "Total Number of Searches" count as "Number of Users" count(eval(count>30)) as "Number of Users with > 30 searches" sum("* Search Count") as "* Search Count"

chart.title: Number of Distinct Users
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t dc(user) from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d dc(user) as "Number of Users"

chart.title: AdHoc Search Adoption
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where searchtype=adhoc groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d count

chart.title: Realtime Search Adoption
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where searchtype=realtime groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d count

chart.title: Dashboard Search Adoption
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where searchtype=dashboard groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d count

chart.title: Scheduled Search Adoption
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where searchtype=scheduled OR searchtype=summarization groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d count

table.title: Top Users
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time sum(NumExports) as NumExports from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby _time user searchtype span=1d | stats sum(count) as NumSearches sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as NumAdHocSearches sparkline(sum(count)) as UsageTrend sum(total_run_time) as HoursOfSearchTime sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",total_run_time,0))) as HoursOfAdHocSearchTime sum(NumExports) as NumberOfExports by user | where user!="splunk-system-user" | eval HoursOfSearchTime = round(HoursOfSearchTime/3600,2) | eval HoursOfAdHocSearchTime = round(HoursOfAdHocSearchTime/3600,2) | sort - NumSearches | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as user OUTPUT name

table.title: Users with Management Chain
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time sum(NumExports) as NumExports from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby _time user searchtype span=1d | stats sum(count) as NumSearches sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as NumAdHocSearches sparkline(sum(count)) as UsageTrend sum(total_run_time) as HoursOfSearchTime sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",total_run_time,0))) as HoursOfAdHocSearchTime sum(NumExports) as NumberOfExports by user| where user!="splunk-system-user" | eval HoursOfSearchTime = round(HoursOfSearchTime/3600,2) | eval HoursOfAdHocSearchTime = round(HoursOfAdHocSearchTime/3600,2) | sort - NumSearches | lookup LDAPMgmtChain sAMAccountName as user | makemv delim="|" ManagementChain | where ManagementChain!="" | rename managerdisplayname as "Manager's Name"

table.title: Users by Management Chain (Inclusive)
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time sum(NumExports) as NumExports from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby _time user searchtype span=1d | stats sum(count) as NumSearches sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as NumAdHocSearches sparkline(sum(count)) as UsageTrend sum(total_run_time) as HoursOfSearchTime sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",total_run_time,0))) as HoursOfAdHocSearchTime sum(NumExports) as NumberOfExports by user| where user!="splunk-system-user" | eval HoursOfSearchTime = round(HoursOfSearchTime/3600,2) | eval HoursOfAdHocSearchTime = round(HoursOfAdHocSearchTime/3600,2) | sort - NumSearches | lookup LDAPMgmtChain sAMAccountName as user | makemv delim="|" ManagementChain | where ManagementChain!="" | stats count as NumUsers sum(NumSearches) as TotalNumSearches sum(NumAdHocSearches) as TotalNumAdHocSearches by ManagementChain | sort - NumUsers
